Articles.Content:
So, as many of you probably found out, while we were waiting for the forums to migrate, we were greeted with a loading screen that said the forums were being migrated. We also got some silly text that popped up, similar to when you start the game. I for one found these quite amusing, and watched them for quite some time. I also took note to start writing them down, as they would be gone after the migration was done. At first I was watching the website and furiously typing the text if I hadn't already seen it and typed it. After about 100 I realized it would be much simpler to just open the website source code and find the entire list. I only missed 14 out of 117, which means I spent about 45 minutes staring and typing  I've added the ones I missed, and now have a complete list of every phrase of text that could've come across your screen during the migration.   It's quite long, so it is contained in the spoiler below:

Spoiler
  • Enjoying a day off after migration was completed in 10 minutes
  • Allowing neutrinos to pass through
  • Removing all data from between September 2012 and April 2013
  • Pressing f5 for safety
  • Emptying bit bucket
  • Eating a Turkey sandwich
  • Deported Squad
  • Coming up with clever remarks
  • Distributing resources
  • Error 418: I'm a teapot
  • Rocket.exe is not responding
  • Finding a replacement engineer
  • Buying more snacks
  • Experimenting with F202
  • Eating Snacks
  • Assimilating the modding community
  • Polishing Unity Awards
  • Entagnling the quantum
  • Writing warning labels
  • Considering Project Pigeon as guidance system
  • reading manual
  • Crossing fingers
  • Painting holes black
  • Making it so
  • Gizoogling all text
  • Implementing Murphy's Law
  • Adding semicolons
  • Hiding experimental test team discussions
  • Downgrading DuoDex to SingleDex
  • Extinguishing flames
  • Porting KSP to a Nokia 3310
  • Trying to dodge Ike
  • Boop, nice!
  • Broadcasting!
  • Blaming Unity
  • Granting administrator permissions to Green Iron Crown
  • Loading KrakenDrive.exe
  • Applying WD-40
  • Consulting Clippy
  • Giving it all she's got captain
  • Your forum is very important to us, please hold
  • Just DOING it
  • Flexing struts
  • Verifying backups
  • All you Kerbals are belong to us
  • Watching grass grow
  • Feeding a banana to Stewart
  • Applying duct tape
  • Implementing total authoritarian rule
  • Spell Checker brought to you by theiPeer
  • Mopping up coffe spills on server backups
  • Coming up with clever rmarks
  • Releasing space whales
  • Raising a barn
  • Detaining Green Iron Crown
  • Watching xkcd comics
  • Arguing Pointlessness
  • Signing signatures
  • Confettifying Fairings
  • Adding negative graviolis
  • Ordering fake passport from spambot
  • Destroying the evidence
  • Literally reinventing the wheel
  • Developing KSP pachinko machine
  • Repurposing Round-8
  • Sourcing server parts from the side of the road
  • Making sure it's plugged in
  • Annoying mayor Poopiter
  • Demoting Rich to Poor
  • Star Trekking across the universe
  • Dragging feet
  • Spamming banbots
  • Banning spambots
  • Playing Fallout 4
  • Salting the forums
  • Faking Mun Landing
  • Communicating with major Tom
  • Archiving mission failure reports
  • Switching SCE to AUX
  • Apologizing to Dave
  • Assuring Qualllity
  • Counting remaining snacks
  • Installing HypeTrain tracks
  • Equating Tsiolkovsky
  • Restting all passwords to 'password'
  • Now with EXTRA space kraken
  • Now hiring: Authoritarian moderators
  • Reversing polarity
  • Negotiating a new gravitational constant
  • Evaluating ALL suggestions
  • Pointing at Lagrange
  • Running around babbling like an idiot
  • Stirring Oxygen tanks
  • Emailing birthday greetings
  • Firing ze missiles
  • Producing
  • Repairing Launchpad
  • Trying to remember combinations for Fault Vault
  • Implementing wormhole
  • We need an adult
  • Attemting to chase cat away from keyboahjsgdvnmx
  • Sending Postcards from Laythe
  • Randomly connecting wires in the server room
  • Removing boosters, your move.
  • Opening pod bay doors
  • Evaluating ALL suggestions
  • On a boat trip near Wallops
  • Sending friendship request to Lithosphere
  • Reticulating splines
  • Building a church of St. NathanKell
  • Reanimating avatars
  • Removing the Magic Boulder from history
  • Gobble, Gobble
  • Knock knock
  • Sending rescue mission
  • Cutting corners
  • Producing
  • Remodulating phase conduits
  • Watching paint dry
  • Running around screaming

Well, hope you enjoyed reading through it. The forum admins sure had fun typing those.
Haha!  I missed most of these, thanks for the list @Endersmens
